feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.3
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: create placeholder connections for git sync flows (#6470) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • feat(pipedrive): create and update actions for Deal, Person, Org and Lead (#6465) @kishanprmr
  • feat(claude): extract structured data action with PDF support (#6536) @kishanprmr
  • feat(PDF piece): convert image to PDF file (#6538) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(cryto): add SHA3-512 hash (#6527) @antonyvigouret
  • feat(PDF): convert text to a PDF file (#6442) @jmgb27
  • fix(Google-Drive): Show latest files when testing New File trigger (#6523) @kishanprmr
  • fix(todoist): fix task completed trigger (#6505) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: naming for urls in the engine (#6510) @abuaboud
  • fix(Google-Drive): Show latest files when testing New File trigger (#6523) @kishanprmr

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: clean up unused fields in plan limits (#6511) @abuaboud
  • feat: ability to customize public url (#6507) @abuaboud
  • feat: create placeholder connections for git sync flows (#6470) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: rename git repo permission to project release (#6530) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: allow users to drag their steps anywhere they want in the canvas (#6531) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: show button next to selection rectangle that users can click on instead of left clicking (#6514) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: remove unsued environment variables & code (#6508) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @antonyvigouret, @hazemadelkhalel, @jmgb27 and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: custom domain is no longer required for saml (#6554) @abuaboud
  • fix: create-trigger command for windows users (#6549) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: custom domain url format with double slash (#6553) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud and @hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.5
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(scrapegraphapi ): smart scraper, local scraper and Markdownify actions (#6561) @OsamaHaikal
  • fix(dropbox): fix support of UTF-8 characters in Dropbox-API-Arg header (#6557) @simonc
  • feat(groq): Ask AI, translate audio and transcribe audio actions (#6548) @loudotdigital
  • feat(seven): send SMS, lookup numbers, send voice call actions and new SMS trigger (#6556) @matthiez
  • feat(krisp-call): new call log trigger (#6552) @DiwashDev
  • feat(tavily): search and extract content actions (#6560) @OsamaHaikal

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: handle undefined connections state in old releases (#6571) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: unify footer in all emails we send and make it white labelled (#6569) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: show correct connections when switching to another project via URL (#6562) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: improve UI for folders in flows table + add sorting button for folders (#6564) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: improve error message when user edits a flow in use (#6563) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @DiwashDev, @OsamaHaikal, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @loudotdigital, @matthiez and @simonc

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.6
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(openai): output file name property for text to speech action (#6575) @jmgb27

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: upsert user identity and hash email (#6592) @abuaboud
  • fix: empty divs take up space on license key page. (#6581) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel, @jmgb27 and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.7
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • chore: add platform switcher (#6644) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • fix(dust): update error status on Dust piece to match changes in the API (#6617) @Blightwidow
  • feat(graphql): send GraphQL request action (#6565) @mahmuthamet
  • feat(surrealdb): run query action and new row trigger (#6532) @maarteNNNN
  • feat: allow using relative url instead of only full url when executing custom api requests (#6620) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(krisp-call): new outbound sms/mms trigger (#6608) @DiwashDev
  • fix(onedrive): fix new file trigger (#6613) @kishanprmr
  • fix(csv): escape delimiter for JSON to CSV actions (#6582) @kishanprmr
  • fix(text-helper): update markdown library for HTML to Markdown action (#6579) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: stripe helper tests (#6653) @abuaboud
  • fix: task limit dialog (#6652) @amrabuaza
  • fix: read platform id from the jwt (#6648) @abuaboud
  • fix: switch project if the user has access to another platform (#6647) @abuaboud
  • fix: auto verify google / saml / jwt login (#6623) @abuaboud
  • fix(publish-piece): Fix issues with publishing pieces to npmi (#6558) @loudotdigital
  • chore: no longer turning off flows when quota exceeded (#6619) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: "Manage Payment Details" was failing in platform billing (#6601) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: stripe webhook for activating subscriptions (#6600) @amrabuaza

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: replace request trial button with contact sales, passing user d‚Ä¶ (#6529) @amrabuaza
  • chore: make the retry strategy of from failed step to retry the same run (#6622) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(paltform-billing-design-enhancement): design enhancement (#6621) @amrabuaza
  • feat: support IRSA for s3 (#6550) @kamal

üìö Documentation

  • fix: domain extension of my website (#6646) @Blightwidow
  • docs: add Blightwidow as a contributor for plugin (#6635) @allcontributors
  • docs: add mahmuthamet as a contributor for plugin (#6633) @allcontributors
  • docs: add maarteNNNN as a contributor for plugin (#6632) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: billing logic (#6656) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps): bump @fastify/multipart from 8.3.0 to 8.3.1 (#6650) @dependabot
  • chore: remove project billing (#6637) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Blightwidow, @DiwashDev, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrabuaza, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kamal, @kishanprmr, @loudotdigital, @maarteNNNN and @mahmuthamet
